data.title: Soundtrack vs. Score: Learn About the Two Types of Film Music
data.meta_description: Composing and selecting the right piece of music for a movie is an important job. Film music can change the entire tone and feel of a film, so filmmakers and composers have to select the right music to bring each scene to life. Two major components of film music are the score and the soundtrack.
